title: AAQ: Is Consciousness a Sign of the Soul or the Mind? | His Grace Madhu Pandit Dasa
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: Bhagavad Gita 13.6.7 Symptoms of life is also consists of field of activity and in the purport

and conviction are two manifestations of this subtle body, mind, ego and intelligence.

symptom of the soul.
